name: Dear Gregorie, Dear Accordio
description:
A game jam game by puppetrois & wedgiebee for Rainbow Jam 2019!

Play as the Gwendoline, who delivers letters as part of their private pigeon post. Today they're delivering letters back and forth between two boys who met at a tavern. Will they become FRIENDS? ENEMIES? ...LOVERS?

Content warning includes mentions of lust & fisticuffs.
